title: JavaScript Programming Mastery
description: Master JavaScript programming to create interactive, dynamic websites and web applications. This comprehensive course covers core and advanced JavaScript concepts, equipping you with the skills to become a full-stack web developer.
about: This course provides an in-depth understanding of JavaScript programming, from basics to advanced topics. Learn how to manipulate the DOM, handle asynchronous operations, and integrate with backend services to create dynamic, scalable web applications.

highlights.name: Core JavaScript Concepts
highlights.description: Understand JavaScript syntax, data types, functions, and control structures.

highlights.name: Asynchronous JavaScript
highlights.description: Learn about promises, async/await, and working with APIs.

highlights.name: DOM Manipulation
highlights.description: Master how to interact with HTML and CSS to dynamically update the web page.

highlights.name: JavaScript Frameworks
highlights.description: Learn popular frameworks like React.js and Node.js to build modern applications.

highlights.name: JavaScript Testing
highlights.description: Understand unit testing, integration testing, and test-driven development with JavaScript.

roles.title: Frontend Developer
roles.description: Expert in creating dynamic and responsive websites using JavaScript and its frameworks.

roles.title: Full Stack Developer
roles.description: Develop both frontend and backend systems using JavaScript-based technologies.

roles.title: Web Developer
roles.description: Design and implement websites with a focus on JavaScript for user interactivity.

roles.title: JavaScript Engineer
roles.description: Specialize in writing clean, efficient, and scalable JavaScript code for web applications.

faq.question: Do I need prior programming knowledge for this course?
faq.answer: No prior experience is needed. The course covers JavaScript fundamentals for beginners.

faq.question: What projects will I work on during this course?
faq.answer: You will build JavaScript applications such as a To-Do list, a Weather app, and a Real-time Chat app.

faq.question: Will the course cover advanced JavaScript topics?
faq.answer: Yes, the course includes advanced topics like JavaScript frameworks (React, Node.js) and testing.

faq.question: Will I receive a certificate after completing the course?
faq.answer: Yes, a certificate will be provided upon successful completion.

faq.question: What tools are required for this course?
faq.answer: You will need a computer with a modern browser and text editor (VS Code, Sublime Text).
